articles.description: India’s top football official Shaji Prabhakaran confident that Pakistan would be graciously hosted during the June 21-July 4 tournament in Bengaluru.
articles.content:
KARACHI: While the cricket boards of Pakistan and India tussle over the hosting of the Asia Cup, things are relatively calmer bet­ween the football federations of the two countries.
India is looking… [+5327 chars]
